wherePawnCanBuild(Board, Pawn) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect.BuildOnSameCellEffect
this method adds the cell where the player built in the first build action to the possibles cells where to build again The added cell will be the only cell where tha player could build again
wherePawnCanBuild(Board, Pawn) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Effect.CanBuildUnderItselfEffect
